title: Rogue Protector
description:
“Integrity first, Service before self, Excellence in all we do.“


For more than twenty years, I lived by my Air Force code.Until I made a choice. Put my family first. Something a soldier is never allowed to do.Now I don’t know who I am. Or where I belong.Getting lost in Mexico sounds like a good idea, but with only guilt and regret as my constant companions, I’ll never figure it all out.Until a chance meeting in a hotel bar changes my course.Dr. Mikayla Salim is everything I’m not. Full of life and on a mission of her own. To change the world through her research.In a few short days, she’s done the impossible. Given me hope.But now she’s in danger. And I’m the only man with the skills to save her. To protect her.And I will. 
​
author: Patricia D. Eddy
